Posts.Content: Hey, My cousin Tanya had the same problem as you do..and her mom was known for having fibrocystic breasts she also just had a tubal pregnacy and the doctor told her it was nothing to worry about and after a year it didnt go away and when she went and got it checked for cancer it was canerous.After a while her cancer spead to her lyhmp nodes, lung, and her bones. I don't mean to worry you or anything, but i dont want anything to happen to anyone else like happened to Tanya..she died in september of breast cancer.
Posts.Title: does anyone have fibrocystic breasts?
